issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.summary: Hello World app will not compile
fields.environment:
Host OS: Windows 7
OS Version: 6.1
OS Arch: x86

JRE Version: 1.8.0_45
JRE Vendor: Oracle Corporation
JRE Home: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_45

Titanium Studio Version: 3.4.1.201410281727
Install Directory: file:/C:/Users/Owner/AppData/Roaming/Appcelerator/Titanium Studio/
Workspace Directory: file:/C:/Users/Owner/Documents/Titanium_Studio_Workspace/

comments.body: please do {{appc ti info -l trace}} from the command line and let us know the results

Hello [~nickr14@yahoo.com], are you still facing this error when applications runs? Try latest SDK 4.1.1.GA. Also install the latest [Node|https://nodejs.org/en/download/releases/] version just to be sure. Reply with your issue. Thanks.
